publicationStmt.p: This is a transcription of a Khom script manuscript (EFEO Pali 51) from the library of the École française d'Extrême-Orient, Paris. It was transcribed by David Wharton and proofread by Alastair Gornall.

sourceDesc.p: Further information about the manuscript can be found here: EFEO Pali 51

body.p: ○ mahākappa-lokasaṇṭhāna-paññatti paripuṇā | ○ phūk 1 san(l)ik 34 dān laew

○ | bhagavā kira adhigatasabbaññutañāṇo hutvā lokānaggaha kara
natthāya anukkamagamanena vesāliyaṃ upanissāya
○ ambavane kuṭāgāre viharanto | tena kho pana samayena
○ aniccadhammakathanakusalo lokapitā kāyavaro varā
nam ativaro varado varāharo bhagavā | pavarapaññattāsane

nisinno | atha kho bhagavā mukhakambala vivaritvā bhagavato
○ saddaṃ nicchāretvā aniccatādhammaṃ pakāsento so bhaga
○vā evam āha | aniccā bhikkhave saṃkhārā adhuvā
○ bhikkhave saṃkhārā anassāsikā bhikkhave saṃkhārā alame
○va bhikkhave sabbasaṃkhāresu nibbandituṃ alaṃ vimuñcituṃ | sine

russa bhikkhave pabbatarājassa caturāsītiyojanasahassubbedho dighassa addhuno accayena nassati vinassati | evaṃ aniccā bhikkhave saṃkhārā dharaṇī bhikkhave mahāpathavī catunahu
tādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalo ○ ayaṃ mahāpathavī dighassa addhuno accayena nassati vinassa ti | evaṃ aniccā bhikkhave saṃkhārā |
mahāsamuddo bhikkhave ratanākaro caturā sītiyojanasahassagambhiro dighassa addhuno acca yena nassati vinassati | evaṃ aniccā
bhikkhave saṃkhārā adhuvā bhikkhave saṃkhārā anassāsikā bhikkhave saṃkhārā alameva sabbasaṃkhāresu nibbandituṃ alaṃ virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuccituṃ |
hoti kho so bhikkhave samayo yaṃ kadāci karahaci dighassa addhuno accayena devo na vassati deve kho bhikkhave avassante ye keci v(i)jjagāmā bhūtagāmā osadhavammi

kādayo milāyanti sussanti nassanti vinassanti | evaṃ aniccā bhikkhave saṃkhārā adhuvā bhikkhave saṃkhārā anassāsikā bhikkhave saṃkhārā alameva sabbasaṃkhāresu nibbindituṃ
alaṃ virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuñcituṃ | hoti kho ○ so bhikkhave samayo yaṃ kadāpi karaha dighassa addhuno accayena du(t)iyo suriyo cātubhavati di(t)i
yassa suriyassa pātubhāvā yā kāci ○ kunadiyo na sussanti tā sussanti vinassanti | ○ evaṃ aniccā bhikkhave saṃkhārā adhuvā bhikkhave
saṃkhārā anassāsikā bhikkhave saṃkhārā ○ alameva sabbasaṃkhāresu nibbindituṃ alaṃ virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuñcituṃ | ○ hoti kho so bhikkhave samayo yaṃ kadāci karahaci
dighassa addhuno accayena tatiyo suriyo (p)ātubhavati tatiyassa suriyassa (p)ātubhāvā yā kāci pañca mahānadiyo gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahiyā

etā pañca mahānadīyo sussanti vinassanti | evaṃ aniccā bhikkhave saṃkhārā adhuvā bhikkhave saṃkhārā anassāsikā bhikkhave saṃkhārā alameva sabbasaṃkhāresu ni
bbindituṃ alaṃ virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuñcituṃ | ho○ti kho so bhikkhave samayo yaṃ kadāci kārahaci dighassa a
ddhuno accayena catuttho suriyo pātibhavati catutthassa suriyassa pātubhāvā ye keci ○ satta mahāsarā bhavanti | ke nāma mahāsarā | ○ anotattadaho kuṇāladayo rathakāradayo
maṇḍākinidaho sīhappapātadaho ○ kaṇṇamuṇ(ḍ)adaho chaddantadaho ete satta mahā○sarā sussanti nassanti vinassanti
evaṃ aniccā bhikkhave saṃkhārā adhuvā bhikkhave saṃkhārā anassāsikā bhikkhave saṃkhārā alameva subbasaṃkhāresu nibbindituṃ alaṃ virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuñcituṃ hoti | satta mahā

sarānaṃ sussantanakāle mahāsamuddho pana oggacchati yāva sattatālaṃ pi saṇṭhāti | tato oggacchati yāva pañcatālaṃ (p)i saṇṭhāti tato oggacchati yāva catutālaṃ pi saṇṭhāti ta
to oggacchati yāva titālaṃ pi saṇṭhāti ta○to oggacchati yāva dvetālaṃ pi saṇṭhāti tato oggacchati ○ yāva ekatālaṃ pi saṇṭhāti | tato
oggacchati yāva sattapurisamattaṃ pi saṇṭhāti ○ tato oggacchati yāva chapurisamattaṃ pi saṇṭhāti tato oggaccha○ti yāva pañcapurisamattaṃ pi saṇṭhāti tato
oggacchati yāva catupurisamattaṃ pi saṇṭhāti ○ tato oggacchati yāva tipurisamattaṃ pi saṇṭhāti tato oggaccha○ti yāva dvepurisamattaṃ pi saṇṭhāti tato ogga
cchati yāva ekapurisamattaṃ pi saṇṭhāti tato oggacchati yāva galappamāṇaṃ pi saṇṭhāti tato oggacchati yāva urappamāṇaṃ pi saṇṭhāti tato oggacchati yāva nābhippamāṇaṃ pi

saṇṭhāti tato oggacchati yāva kajippamāṇaṃ pi saṇṭhāti tato oggacchati yāva ūruppamāṇaṃ pi saṇṭhāti tato oggacchati yāva jaṅghappamāṇaṃ pi saṇṭhāti | tato o
ggacchati yāva goppapamāṇaṃ pi saṇṭhāti ○ tato oggacchati yāva yathā mahā samuddassa udakaṃ se○yyathāpi bhikkhave saradasamaye phullasitake deve
vassante tattha tattha pādagoppake udakā thi○tā honti | evaṃ aniccā bhikkhave saṃkhārā | la ○ | alameva sabbasaṃkhāresu nibbindituṃ alaṃ vimuñci
tuṃ | hoti kho so bhikkhave sama○yo yaṃ kadāci karahaci dighassa addhuno accayena ○ pañcamo suriyo pātubhavati |
pañcamassa suriyassa pātubhāvā mahāsamuddassa udakaṃ aṅgulipamāṇampi na hoti | evaṃ aniccā bhikkhave saṃkhārā | la | alameva sabbasaṃkhāresu

nibbindituṃ alaṃ virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuñcituṃ | hoti kho so bhikkhave samayo yaṃ kadāci karahaci dighassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho suriyo pātubhavati chaṭṭhassa suriyassa
pātubhāvā imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe sabbadisā ○ dhumenti sandhumenti | seyyathāpi bhikkhave kumbhakārā bhā○janaṃ katvā sabba āmakabhājanaṃ bhājanagharasmiṃ
pavesanti bhājanassa upari allamattikā○hi limpitvā tattha aggiṃ pavesetvā bhājanaghara….āre dhumenti ○ sandhumenti | evameva chaṭṭhassa suriyassa saṃ
phussena dhumā uppajjanti sakalacakkavā○ḷe dhumenti sandhamenti | evaṃ aniccā bhikkhave saṃkhārā | ○ la | alameva sabbasaṃkhāresu nibbindituṃ alaṃ vi
rajjituṃ alaṃ vimuñcituṃ | hoti kho so bhikkhave samayo yaṃ kadāci karahaci dighassa addhuno accayena sattamo suriyo pātubhavati | sattamassa suri

yassa pātubhāvā ayañca mahāpathavī sattamahāmacchikatelamissitena sattasuriyasantāpena tahiṃ tahiṃ agg(īph)ālā pātubhavanti | sabbaṃ agg(īph)ālaṃ ekato
hutvā eka(ph)ālaṃ pātubhavati jhāpeti ○ dayhati paridayhati | tadā kāle uṭṭhahante aggi(ph)āle ○ yugandharassa kūṭāni palujjanti | tato
isindarakuṭāni palujjanti | tato ○ kāravikakuṭāni palujjanti | tato sudassanakuṭā○ni palujjanti | tato nemindarakuṭāni pa
lujjanti | tato vinantakakuṭāni palujja○nti | tato assakaṇṇakuṭāni palujjanti | tato aggi○khandhā sinerussa khandhāni saṃparivattanti jhāpe
nti dayhanti paridayhanti | yāva sinerussa aggi(ph)āle jhāpenti ekayojanasatikāni sinerussa siṅgāni palujjanti | dviyojanasatikāni sinerussa siṅgāni palujjanti |

| tiyojanasati(k)āni sinerussa siṅgāni palujjanti | catuyojanasatikāni sinerussa siṅgāni palujjanti | pañcayojanasatikāni sinerussa siṅgāni palujjanti | chayojanasa
tikāni sinerussa siṅgāni palujjanti | satta○yojanasatikāni sinerussa siṅgāni palujjanti | aṭṭhayoja○nasatikāni sinerussa siṅgāni palujjanti |
navayojanasatikāni sinerussa siṅgā palujja○nti | dasayojanasatikāni sinerussa siṅgāni palujjanti | sinerussa parimāṇā kapparukkha uyyānavimānakuṭāgārapokkharaṇi○yo devapurā jhāpenti dayhanti paridayhanti |
○ evaṃ aniccā bhikkhave saṃkhārā honti |
| tato yāmājhāpeti dayhati paridayhati nassati vinassati | tato tussitājhāpeti dayhati paridayhati nassati vinassati | tato nimmā

narati jhāpeti dayhati paridayhati nassati vinassati | tato paranimmitavassavatti jhāpeti dayhati paridayhati nassati vinassati | tato brahmapārisa(j)jā jhāpeti dayhati pa
ridayhati nassati vinassati | tato brahmapa○rohitā jhāpeti dayhati paridayhati nassati vinassati | ta○to mahābrahmā jhāpeti dayhati paridayhati na
ssati vinassati | tato parittābhā jhāpeti ○ dayhati paridayhati nassati vinassati | tato appa○māṇābhā jhāpeti dayhati paridayhati nassati vi
nassati | tato ābhassarassa he○(ṭṭh)ā jhāpeti | tena vuttaṃ | agginā ābhassarā ○ heṭṭhā āpena subhagiṇhakā vehapphala
to vātena evaṃ loko vinassati | satta sattagginā vārā aṭṭhame aṭṭha modakā catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā eko vāyuvaro siyā ti |

appamāṇābhācchāribhā parittābhācchārikā mahābrahmācchārikā brahmapārisajjācchārikā sinerucchārikā satta pabbatācchārikā pathavī sabbācchārikā
sabbaṃ cchārikaṃ na paññāyittha | ya○thā kapaladīpe telaṃ puriyitvā vajjiṃ āropetvā jhāpeti ○ pajjalati sabbaṃ khiyati sussati telānaṃ
cchārikaṃ na paññāyati evameva tathā○bhavanacchārikaṃ na paññāyati | tadā ..āle imasmiṃ ○ cakkavāḷe yevacchārikā na paññāyati |
camma vinā bheriṃ saṇṭhānaṃ viya ahosi | ○ aññepi cakkavāḷā dayhanti nassanti vinassanti | ○ yāvajjatanā saṇṭhāti ahosi |
| tasmā hi aniccā bhikkhave saṃkhārā | la | anassāsikā bhikkhave saṃkhārā alameva sabbaṃ saṃkhāresu nibbindituṃ alaṃ virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuñci

tuṃ | hoti kho so bhikkhave samayo yaṃ kadāci karaha dighassa addhuno accayena utusamuṭṭhānasamuppannaṃ vassaṃ pathamantāva dhulisa disa(ṃ) vasi | ta
to dighassa addhuno accayena sāsapamattampi vassaṃ vasi | tato dighassa addhuno accayena muggamāsampamāṇaṃ pi vassaṃ vasi | ta
to dighassa addhuno accayena ā⟪ma⟫lakamāṇaṃ pi vassaṃ vasi | tato dighassa addhano accayena ○ kapiṭṭhaphalamāṇaṃ pi vassaṃ vasi | ta
to dīghassa addhuno accayena tālapamāṇaṃ vassaṃ vasi | tato dighassa addhuno accayena nālikeraphalapamāṇaṃ pi vassaṃ vasi |
tato dighassa addhano accayena lāvupamāṇaṃ vassaṃ vasi | tato dighassa addhuno accayena kakkāraphalapamāṇaṃ vassaṃ vasi | tato digha

ssa addhuno accayena vaḍhati | goṇampamāṇaṃ vassaṃ vasi | yāva usubhapamāṇaṃ vassaṃ vasi | tato dighassa addhuno accayena mahisampamāṇaṃ vassaṃ vasi |
tato vaḍhati hatthipamāṇaṃ pi vassaṃ vasi | ○ tato vaḍhati gharapamāṇam pi vassaṃ vasi | tato va○ḍhati yāva (t)āvutapamāṇam pi vassaṃ vasi |
tato vaḍhati yāva yojanapamāṇam pi vassaṃ va○si | tato vaḍhati yāva dviyojanapamāṇa○m pi vassaṃ vasi | tiyojana catuyo
jana pañcayojana chayojana satayojana a○ṭṭhayojana navayojana dasayojanapamāṇam pi vassaṃ vasi | ○ tato vaḍhati yāva satayojanapamāṇaṃ vassaṃ va
si | tato vaḍhati yāva sahassayojanapamāṇaṃ vassaṃ vasi | tato yāva ekavassaṃ vasi | imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe vassaṃ vasi | nikujjita kum(bh)amukha

to udakadhārā viya ca ahosi | dighassa addhuno accayena udakaṃ vaḍhati ahosi | yāva tāva vaḍhanakāle yāva manussasaṇṭhānaṃ vassaṃ vasi | tayo vaḍha
ti yāva vātumahārājikāsaṇṭhānaṃ tato ○ vaḍḍhati yāva tāvatiṃsāsaṇṭhānaṃ tato vaḍhati yāva ○ yāmāsaṇṭhānaṃ tato vaḍhati yāva tussi
tāsaṇṭhānaṃ tato vaḍhati yāva nimmānaratisaṇṭhānaṃ tato vaḍhati yāva paranimmitavassavattisaṇṭhānaṃ ○ tato vaḍhati yāva brahmapārisajjāsaṇṭhānaṃ ta
to vaḍhati yāva brahmaparohitāsaṇṭhanaṃ ○ tato vaḍhati yāva mahābrahmāsaṇṭhānaṃ tato vaḍhati yāva parittābhāsaṇṭhānaṃ ta
to vaḍhati yāva appamāṇā⟪bhā?⟫saṇṭhānaṃ | tāva vassaṃ chijjati | atha mahābrahmā buddhānaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ kappaṃ passitukāmo brahmalokato otaritvā udakatala

saṇṭhānamhi padumagacchaṃ uṭṭhahi | yadi ekabuddho uppajjati ekapaduma⟪pu⟫pphaṃ upaṭṭhahi | yadi dve buddhā uppajjanti dve padumapupphāni uṭṭhahanti | yadi tayo bu
ddhā uppajjanti tiṇi padumapupphāni uppajjan­ti | yadi catubuddhā uppajjanti catupadumapupphāni uppajjanti | yadi pañca buddhā uppajjanti
pañca padumapupphāni uppaṭṭhahanti | ○ imasmiṃ pana kappe pañca buddhā uppajjanti pañca padumapupphāni uṭṭhahanti | atha mahābrahmā yadi e
kapadumapupphaṃ passi evaṃ avoca bhonto ○ devasaṃghā imaṃ ugghosanaṃ suṇātha | kiṃ ugghoso | imasmiṃ kappe eko buddho uppajjissatī ti
byākaraṇaṃ karoti | yadi dve padumapupphāni dissanti imasmiṃ kappe dve buddhā uppajjissantī ti byākaraṇaṃ karoti | yadi tīṇi padumapupphāni dissanti imasmiṃ kappe

tayo buddhā uppajjissantī ti byākaraṇaṃ karoti | yadi cattāri padumapupphāni dissanti imasmiṃ ⟪kappe⟫ cattāro buddhā uppajjissantī ti byākaraṇaṃ karoti | yadi pañca padumapupphāni
dissanti imasmiṃ kappe pañca buddhā uppa○jjissantī ti byākaraṇaṃ karoti | yadā pana ekasmiṃ ka○ppe ekasambuddho uppajjissati | ta
dā sāro nāma kappo | yadā pana eka○smiṃ kappe dve sammāsambuddhā uppajjissanti | tadā ma○ṇḍo nāma kappo | yadā pana eka○smiṃ kappe
tayo sammāsambuddhā uppajjissanti tadā varo ○ nāma kappo | yadā pana ekasmiṃ kappe cattāro sammāsambuddhā uppajjissanti tadā sāramaṇḍo nāma kappo
| yadā pana ekasmiṃ kappe pañca sammāsambuddhā uppajjissanti tadā bhaddo nāma kappo | sārakappe kiṃ nāma sammāsambuddhā uppajjissanti | maṇḍo nāma kappe kiṃ nāma sammāsambuddhā uppajji

ssanti | vare nāma kappe kiṃ nāma sammāsambuddhā uppajjissanti | sāramaṇḍakappe kiṃ nāma sammāsambuddhā uppajjissanti | bhaddakappe kiṃ nāma sammāsambuddhā uppajjissanti |
sārakappe koṇḍañño nāma sammāsambuddho | ○ tenāha | sārakappe ayaṃ buddho koṇḍañño nā○ma nāyako adutiyo hoti sattānaṃ |
lokānaṃ hitakārako ti | maṇḍakappe ti○sso pusso nāma sammāsambuddhā | tenāha | ○ maṇḍakappe ime buddhā pusso tisso ca
nāyako dve buddhā upapajjanti lo○kānaṃ hitakārakā ti | varakappe atthadassi piyadassi ○ dhammadassi nāma ime buddhā | tenāha |
atthadassi piyadassi dhammadassi mahāmuni varakappe tayo buddhā lokānaṃ hitakārakā ti | sāramaṇḍakappe taṇhaṅkaro medhaṅkaro saraṇaṅkaro dipaṅkaro

ime buddhā | tenāha | taṇhaṅkaro medhaṅkaro atho pi saraṇaṅkaro dipaṅkaro ca sambuddhā sāramaṇḍe samuṭṭhitā ti | bhaddakappe kakkusando ko
ṇāgamaṇo kassappo sākyapuṅgavo go○tamo anāgate metteyyo ime buddhā | te○nāha | kakkusando konāgamaṇo ka
ssappo sākyapuṅgavo mettayyo ca ○ mahātejo bhaddakappe samuṭṭhitā ti | evaṃ kappe ○ udakaṃ parisamuṭṭhitaṃ padumapupphapamāṇaṃ passa
ti byākaraṇaṃ karoti | imasmiṃ ka○ppe pañcabuddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā sundharakappo uttamaka○ppo bhaddakappo ti vuccati | hoti kho so
bhikkhave samayo yaṃ kadaci karahaci dighassa addhuno accayena taṃ pana kappassa udakaṃ catuhi vātehi samiritaṃ | kiṃ nāma catuhi vātehī samiritaṃ | atthi vātaṃ atthi visama

vātaṃ atthi paccavātaṃ atthi vātāvattaṃ | catuhi vātehi samiritaṃ | sakala udakassa upari (ā)kula ummiyo jāto | sabbā ummiyo pubbulapheṇu jātā | paṭhamaṃ kalalaṃ ho
ti | tato ambudā jātā | ambu○dato jāyate pesi | pesito ghaṇo hoti | ○ ghaṇā uppannā | ghaṇato suvaṇṇamayā bhumi
hoti | yathā purāṇaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ hoti ○ | maṇīvimānā sakalatale tahiṃ ⟪tahiṃ⟫ uṭṭhahiṃsu | ○ atha te mahābrahmāno appamāṇābhāra puriyiṃ
su | tato dighassa addhuno accayena udakaṃ oggacchati | appamānābhā heṭṭhāti aṭṭhā○si | taṃ pana udakaṃ catūhi vātehi samiritaṃ |
| taraṅgatarangā jātā | taraṅgataraṅgato hi udakaṃ pheṇupubbulā jātā | pubbulato ghaṇā uppannā | ghaṇato suvaṇṇamayā pathavi jātā tāsmiṃ upari tale ma

ṇivimānā tahiṃ tahiṃ uṭṭhahiṃsu | atha te mahābrahmāno tath’eva parittābhā purayiṃsu | tato heṭṭhā dighassa addhuno accayena udakaṃ oggacchati taṃ pana udakaṃ catū
hi vātehi samiritaṃ | taraṅgataraṅgā jā○tā | taraṅgataraṅgato udakaṃ (ph)eṇupubbuṇā jātā | ○ pubbulato ghaṇā jātā | ghaṇato suva
ṇṇapathavi jātā | tasmiṃ tale maṇivimānā ○ tahiṃ uṭṭhahiṃsu | atha te mahābrahmāno tath’eva mahā○brahmā purayiṃsu | tato mahābrahmā he
ṭṭhā dighassa addhuno accayena udakaṃ oggacchati | ○ taṃ pana udakaṃ catuhi vātehi samiritaṃ | taraṅgataraṅgā jātā ○ | taraṅgataraṅgato udakaṃ pheṇupubbulā jātā
pubbulato ghaṇā jātā ghaṇato suvaṇṇapathavī jātā | pathavītale maṇīvimānā tahiṃ tahiṃ uṭṭhahiṃsu | atha te mahābrahamāno tatheva brahmaparohitā purayimsu | tato

he[ṭṭhā] dighassa addhuno accayena udakaṃ oggacchati catūhi vātehi samiritaṃ | taraṅgataraṅgā jātā ā⟪ku⟫lena udakaṃ pheṇupubbulā jātā pubbulato ghaṇā uppannā ghaṇato suvaṇṇa
mayā bhūmi hoti | tasmiṃ tale maṇī○vimānā tahiṃ tahiṃ uṭṭhahiṃsu | atha te mahābrahmāno ○ brahmapārisajjā purayiṃsu | evaṃ
brahmalokasaṇṭhānaṃ | tenāha | ○ pārisajjā p(a)rohitā mahābrahmā parittā a○ppamāṇābhā icc’evaṃ pañca brahmabhavā iti |
hoti kho so bhikkhave samayo yaṃ kadāci ○ karahaci dighassa addhuno accayena brahmapārisajjā he○ṭṭha udakaṃ oggacchati tatheva balavavātehi samiri
taṃ | udakapubbulapheṇu ghaṇā jjātā ghaṇato suvaṇṇapathavi jātā | tathānaṃ paranimmitavasavati nāma | imasmiṃ thāne sattaratanavimānā nānāvicittā paññā

yanti | paranimmitavasavattidevā nibbattetvā pūrayiṃsu | ekapajalaṃ hoti | tato heṭṭhā dighassa addhuno accayena udakaṃ oggacchati taṃ pana udakaṃ
vāyuvetena samiritaṃ | taraṅgataraṅgā u○ṭṭhahiṃsu udakaṃ pheṇupubbulā ghaṇā jātā suvaṇṇapa○thavi sañjātā suvaṇṇapathavītale tattha tattha sa
ttaratanavimānā nimmānarati nāma paṭalā jātā | ○ nimmānaratidevā puyiṃsu | dighassa addhuno accayena ○ nimmānarati heṭṭhā udakaṃ oggacchati taṃ pana
udakaṃ mahāvātena samiritaṃ udakaphe○ṇupubbulaṃ udakaṃ pheṇupubbulā pathavighaṇā suvaṇṇā ○ tussitasaṇṭhānā samuṭṭhitā imasmiṃ tu
ssitabhavanatale sabbaratanapāsādā uṭṭhahiṃsu | tussitadevā purayiṃsu | tussita⟪ssa⟫ heṭṭhā udakaṃ dighassa addhuno accayena oggacchati taṃ pana udakaṃ vā

tena samiritaṃ | udakapubbulapheṇu sañjātā suvaṇṇapiṇḍasaṇṭhānā viya yāmā paṭalā sañjātā imasmiṃ suvaṇṇapathavitale tahiṃ tahiṃ thāne sattarata
napāsādaṃ uppannaṃ hoti | yā○mā devā purayiṃsu | tenāha | yāmā ca tu○ssitā c’eva nimmānarati paranimmitā cattāri
thānāni sañjātā jānitvā pajalā i○ti | tato yāmā heṭṭhā udakaṃ dighassa addhuno accayena kappassa osidati | lokasa
ṇṭhānaṃ uppannaṃ hoti | udakassa u○pari ayaṃ pathavi parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalā | seyya○thāpi nāma kaṃsapāṭiyo | athavā |
kumbhakāracakkaṃ vā evam eva pathavi maṇḍalaṃ parimaṇḍalā | ○ seyyathāpi nāma kaṃsapāṭimukhavaṭo | evam eva imissā pathaviyā cakkavāḷapabbato | seyyathāpi

sakaṭiyā majjhe nābhi | evam eva imissā pathaviyā majjhe sineru pabbatarājā jāto susaṇṭhito cat(u)rasso | seyyathāpi nāma padumo vaḍhaṇa(g)iṇno bhava(tt)a
ttināsandaho phalakaṃ vā olambhaka oṇṇo | ○ evam eva sineru pabbatarājā jāto susaṇṭhito caturasso ○ | caturāsīti yojanasahassāni udakaṃ
ajjhogāḷho | caturāsīti yojanasahassāni accuggato | caturāsīti yojanasahassāni tassekamekā bāhā | mahāsamu
ddassa abbhantare caturāsīti yojanasahassā○ni cattāri vaṇṇāni honti eko passo suvaṇṇamayo | ○ eko passo rajaṭamayo | eko passo
indanilamayo | eko passo phalikamayo | tenāha | pācinapassaṃ rajaṭaṃ dakkhiṇaṃpi indanilaṃ pacchimaṃ phalikaṃ passaṃ uttaraṃ kāñcanāmayan ti | sineru

cakkavāḷapabbataṃ (j)ānitabbaṃ | cakkavāḷaṃ āyāmato ca vitthārato yojanānaṃ dvādasasatasahassāni tīṇi sahassāni cattari sattāni paññāsa yojanāni ceva | pari
kkhepato ca pana cakkavāḷaṃ sabbaṃ satasaha○ssaṃ chatiṃsa parimaṇḍalaṃ dasa ceva sahassāni aḍhuḍhāni sa○tāni ca evaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ pabbataparimaṇḍa
laṃ | cakkavāḷapabbatassa ubbedho ○ kiṃ pamāṇo | tenāha | dve asīti saha○ssāni ajjho(g)āḷho mahaṇṇave
accuggato tāvadeva cakkavāḷasilucca○yo. parikkhipitvāna tam sabbaṃ lokadhātumayaṃ thito | ○ evaṃ cakkavāḷapabbatapamānaṃ yugandharato cakkavā
ḷapabbatassa antare aṭṭha dipāni pātubhavanti | puraṭṭhima sinerussa eko dipo hoti | āgane sinerussa eko dipo hoti | dakkhiṇa sinerussa eko

dipo hoti | harati sinerussa eko dipo hoti | pacchima sinerussa eko dipo hoti | bāyabya sinerussa eko dipo hoti | uttara sinerussa
eko dipo hoti | isāna sinerussa eko dipo hoti | aṭṭha dipā sambhavanti | puraṭṭhima sinerussa pubbavidehadipo
nāma | dakkhiṇa sinerussa jambūdipo nāma | pacchima sinerussa amarato dipo nāma | uttara sinerussa uttarakurudipo nāma | pubbavidehato ja
mbudipassa antare eko supaṇṇadipo nāma | jambudipato amaratoyānassa antare eko supaṇṇadipo | amaragoyānato uttarakurussa antare eko
supaṇṇadipo | uttarakuruto pubbavidehassa antare eko supaṇṇadipo | ime cattaro supaṇṇadipā honti | yojanasahassaṃ abhina

vesanavattadipo | paṭhamaṃ pathavimaṇḍalā bodhiruhathānamaṇḍitā pana pathavinābhi pathamavimajjho | tato yāva dasasahassayojanapamānaṃ saṇṭhāti |
anulomena cattāro supaṇṇadipā ma○hādipā sambhavanti | dvisahassaparittadipā tā○ni sabbāni pacchā sambhavanti | yadā pana pa
thavikalalā vātena samiritā | ambuka○ppamānā thūpathūpā ninnaninnā samasamā | yadā pana ku○ṅgubhattassa paccakā viya | evameva tathā
mahāpathavi thūpathūpā pabbatā jātā ninnaninnā ○ samuddā jātā samasamā khettavanā jātā | ja○mbudipo pana paraṭṭhimabbāhā dviyojanasaha
ssāni | pacchimabāhā dviyojanasahassāni | uttarabāhā dviyojanasahassāni | dakkhiṇabāhā dviyojanasahassāni |

so hoti parikkhepo pañcavisati yojanasahassāni | āyāmato ca vitthārato ca dasasahassayojanāni | sakaṭamukho ayampi dipo | nadipamāṇo
pabbatapamāṇo | nadī antare pabbatā tiṭṭhanti | pabbatantare nadiyo sandanti | aparatoyānadipo vikhambhena dviyojanasahassāni tīṇi
yojanasatāni ca tevisati yojanāni tīṇi bhāgayojanāni so hoti parikhepo cattari yojanasahassāni pañca yojana
satāni ca | āyāmato ca vitthārato ca satta yojanasahassāni | aḍhḍhacandasadiso dipo | nadipamāṇo pabbatapamāṇo |
nadi antare pabbatā tiṭṭhanti | pabbatantare nadiyo sandanti | pubbavidehadipo vikhambhena dviyojanasahassāni tīṇi yojanasatāni ca tiṃsati yoja

nāni tibhāgayojanāni | so hoti parikhepo tīṇi yojanasahassāni pañca yojanasatāni ca | āyāmato ca vitthārato ca satta yojanasahassāni | canda
maṇḍalasadiso dipo | nadīpamāṇo pabbatapamāṇo | nadi antare pabbatā tiṭṭhanti | pabbatantare nadiyo sandanti | uttarakurudi
po puraṭṭhimabāhā dviyojanasahassāni pacchimabāhā dviyojanasahassāni | uttarabāhā dviyojanasahassāni | dakkhiṇa
bāhā dviyojanasahassāni | so hoti parikkhepo ca cattari yojanasahassāni | āyāmato ca vitthārato ca aṭṭha yojanasaha
ssāni | caturassamukho dipo | so dipo suvaṇṇapabbatena parikkhitto sa(dā) obhāsajāto | so dipo samo sitena suci akaṇḍako |

samo ti natthi sombho vā sarako vā āvāto vā papāto vā uliṅgalatā vā tena vuccati samo ti | sitene ti tattha siho vā byaggho vā dipi vā accho vā taraccho vā ahi vā kukkuraṃ vā
ye vā pana aññepi sattā na santi | tena vuccati siteneti | sucī ti tattha tattha asuci natthi | natthi byagghadugandhā natthi dipidugandhā natthi
accadugandhā natthi taracchadugandhā natthi ahidugandhā natthi kukkuradugandhā natthi dugandhā sihabyagghakuṇapādayo na santi | yam pi manussā
naṃ uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā tassa bhūmiyaṃ santisidati | tato patikulaṃ haññati tena vuccati sucī ti | akaṇḍako ti natthi sihadugandhā sihakuṇapaṃ vā byagghakuṇapaṃ vā
dipikuṇapaṃ vā acchakuṇapaṃ vā taracchakuṇapaṃ vā ahikuṇapaṃ vā kukkurakuṇapaṃ vā manussakuṇapaṃ vā natthi rukudugandhā ye vā pana aññe pi dugandhā na santi | tena vucca

ti akaṇḍako ti | yattha pathavī nāma tiṇajātivaddhā nicca-abhirūpā dassaniyā moragīvasaṅgāsā kaddalimigavākacirassa vā ajinappaveniyā vā ekasamāpabbā caturaṅgu
linā ti vattanti | tattha nadiyo acchodakā supatiṭṭhakā savanasitacchāyapaṭicchannagirikaṇḍarakulā sandanti | tattha cattāro supaṇṇadipā simbalivanā jātā |
tesaṃ mahādipānaṃ antare cattāro mahāsamuddhā jātā | ayaṃ amhākaṃ dipo dasasahassayojanapamāṇo |
tisahassayojanapadese manussā vasanti | catusahassayojanapamāṇo padeso osidati | tisahassayojanapamāṇe padese himavā pa
bbato patiṭṭhito | sabbarukkhavibhāgo kathetabbo yāya jambūyā jambūdipo paññāyati | sā jambū sujātā susaṇṭhitā supakiṇṇatā (b)ahūmū

lamattā vicittapattā manāpī piyā | yathāpi nāma dakkhena mālākārena nālo vā vataṃso vā sukato pattā vā suparināmitā | evam eva sā jambū satayojanāni ucca
tarena paññāsayojakhandhā | paṇṇarasayojanavatamānā | tassekamekā sākhā paññāsa yojanāni | tiyojanasatikāni parikkhepena
| tassa phalāni mahantāni rasasampannāni paramamadhurasugandhāni udakamadhu anelakaṃ viya evaṃpissā phalāni ussitapattāni |
haritavaṇṇāni pupphāni mahantāni rattābhāni paramasugandhāti jambūkassa phalakhādanatthāya tattha kūṭāgāramattā sakuṇā | yathā kuñjaranāgā saṭṭhihāyanā
evamattā te sakuṇā tāni phalāni paribhuñjanti | puraṭṭhimāna sākhānaṃ phalāni yebhuyyena jambūdipe patanti | pacchimānaṃ sākhānaṃ phalāni | jambūdipe

patanti | dakkhiṇasākhānaṃ phalāni jambūdipe patanti | uttarānaṃ sākhānaṃ phaninadiyaṃ patanti | macchā paribhuñjanti | tipañcayojanakhandho parikkhepā naggavhayā
paññāsayojanakhandhā sākhāyāmā sa○mantato | sattayojanavitthinnā tāvadeva ca ugga○tā etāni vattakhandhāni paññā
sā ca visālato jambū yassānubhāve○na jambūdipo pakāsito yañ c’etaṃ jambūpamāṇaṃ ○ himavantassa pathese thitaṃ etad eva a
surānaṃ cittapātaliyā garuddhānaṃ simbalirukkhassa kadambassa amara(g)oyāne ka○pparukkhassa uttare pubbavidehe sari
sassa tāvatiṃse pārichattakassā ti | tenāhu porāṇā pātali asurānañ ca supaṇṇānañ ca simbali jambū idha manussānaṃ devānaṃ pāricch(u)ttako

kadambā amara(g)oyāne kapparukkho ca uttare pubbavideha sariso kappaṭṭhāyi ime matā | khandhā pattā mahāsākhā ubbedhā parimaṇḍalā sabbe e
kaparicchedā samā tiṭṭhanti sassatā ti ○ | sinerussa pabbatarañño cattari kuṭāni | puraṭṭhimakuṭaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ | pacchimakuṭaṃ rajaṭama
yaṃ | uttarakuṭaṃ veduriyamayaṃ | ○ dakkhiṇaṃ kuṭaṃ phalikamayaṃ | evaṃ tāni pana sabbāni kuṭāni yeva sabba ratanamayā | atha tattha hi u
ppannāni kuṭāni pañca yojanasatāni | si○nerussa muddhani caturāsīti yojanasahassāni | āyā○mena tathā vitthārena caturāsīti yojanasaha
ssāni | suvaṇṇamayā bhūmi tassā pi majjhe dasasahassayojanapamānaṃ tāvatiṃsadevanagaraṃ dasasahassa dvārayuttaṃ | tassa pācinadvāraṃ pacchimadvārato dasayojanasahassaṃ

| dakkhiṇadvāraṃ uttarato dasayojanasahassaṃ | sabbaṃ pana nagaraṃ mahāvithipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ | nivesanesu ghaṭitaratanakhacittaṃ vipula daḷhaṃ kavātaggalesikkhavibhusitaṃ dvāraṃ |
sattaratanamayehi kusalakammasippiyaghaṭi○tehi sattahi pākārehi parikkhittaṃ | dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ pākārā○namantare pañca pañca yojanasatikaṃ sattaratana
mayehi pa⟪ri⟫kkhittaṃ devanagaraṃ ārāmuyyānata(dh)ākapokkharaṇīcatudisavibhusitaṃ | tassa ma○jjhe yojanasahassubbedho vejaya
nto nāma pāsādo tham(g)aphalikasahassapaṭima○ṇḍito dinakarasahassatirekappabho | suraga○ṇapasādajanano visesato nayana
nivāsasaṃbhuto | saramajjhe padumanikaro viya tiṭṭhati | tasmiṃ pāsāde bhumitalaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ satta kūṭāgārehi upasobhitaṃ | kuṭāgāra

gabbhe satta sata accharāyo ekekissā accharāya satta sataparivārā | so pāsādo vicittadvārakoṭīhi parikkhitto sabbāsaṃ aḍḍhatayakoṭīnaṃ nāṭakitthīnaṃ paripuṇṇo tiyojanasa
tubbedhehi vibhūto nānāvidhakhacitadha(j)āhi ○ suvaṇṇamayāsu yaṭṭhisu maṇidha(j)ā ahesuṃ | ○ maṇimayāsu yaṭṭhisu suvaṇṇadhajjā ahesuṃ |
pabāḷhamayāsu yaṭṭhisu rajaṭapattadhajjā ahe○suṃ | sattaratanamayāsu yaṭṭhisu sattaratanadhajjā a○hesuṃ | sattayojanasutu
bbedho vejayanto nāma pāsādo sa○ttaratanamayo hutvā nibbatti | yojanasat(t)apa○rimaṇḍalo paññāsayojanaparimāna
khandho pārichattako | parichattakassa mūle paṇḍakambasilā ahosi | dighato saṭṭhi yojanāni bahalato paṇṇarasa yojanāni |

vatthārena paññāsa yojanāni | jayakusumalākhārarattakavaṇo | yattha nisiditakāle upaḍḍhakāyo pavīsati | uṭṭhitakāle uṇṇamati | tass’e
va avidure dakkhiṇadisābhāge sudhammā devasa○bhā sattaratanamayā ādittobhāsayaṃ va | pabālha○mayasattaratanamayā gopāṇasiyo pakkhapāsa
ko rajaṭamukhavajjira-indanilamayā | ○ iṭṭhakachandanaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ chaddanaṃ ettha rajaṭamayaṃ sattara○tanamayaṃ | thupikā rajaṭamayā
phalakā phalikamayā | sahattho○lambanakā maṃsāragallamayā | piṭṭhāsayā muttāma○yā ubbedhato pañcayojanasatikāni
āyāmavitthārāni tiyojanasatikāni | navayojanaparikkhepasatāni caturāsīti thambhasahassāni | patitthitāni tāni suvaṇṇarajaṭavedikā

ni phalikasaṇḍitā bhūmi | nandapokkharaṇi pañcayojanasatikā anekasat(a)titthāni sopāṇapatimaṇḍitāni | cittalatāvanaṃ pañcayojanasatikaṃ nānāvaṇṇarukkha
gacchalatāpupphaphalavicittaṃ | pārichattakassa ○ dibbapupphāni honti | tassa pārichattakassa ārohanakiccaṃ vā aṅgasanakiccaṃ vā natthi | yadā pa
na sudhammaṃ devasabhaṃ pavīsi tadā kāle eko vāto nālato pariharitvā sampaṭicchannakavāto pupphāni sa○mpaṭicchi pavesakavāto sudhammaṃ devasa
bhaṃ pavesesi niharakavāto purāṇapupphā○ni niharitvā chaddesi saṇṭhārakavāto pupphāni saṇṭharitā majjhe yojanappamāṇaṃ dhammāsanaṃ hoti |
setachattaṃ yojanappamānaṃ dhārayamānaṃ tassa upari | tayo puggalā dhammaṃ desenti | katame tayo puggalā | brahmā sanaṃkumāro vā sakko vā tipiṭaka

bhikkhu vā ime tayo puggalā dhammaṃ desenti | atha sakko devarājā dhammāsanāruṇṇo attano pubbakammaṃ pakāsento devānaṃ evam āha | suṇantu pe yāvatikā devasaṃ
ghā idh’āgatā dhammaṃ vo desayissāmi yathābhūtaṃ pure kataṃ | dānasakkomihaṃ dātuṃ sakko ten’asmiṃ mārisā indaṃ paṭṭhemi dhammena te
na indo’ti maṃ vidū | accharekā sujātā nāma tassā pati bhavāmihaṃ sujappatī ti jānanti indo devānamissaro | yaṃ hoti
devalokasmiṃ devarajasiridharo | tañca uposathakammassa nisandena labhāmi ’han ti | desanāpariyosāneva taṃ sabbe devaga
ṇā añjaliṃ paggayhitvā namassanti | sattapabbate dipeti yugandharo nāma pabbato sinerumajjhe pamāṇo ucco satta ratanamayo dibbuyyānavimānakapparukkhapa

ṭimaṇḍito bahū devā ākiṇṇadevā suvaṇṇamayā bhūmi akkante pāde oṇamati uddhare pāde puna pūreti pādava(l)añjitaṃ na dissati | isindaro pana pa
bbato yugandaramajjhe pamāṇo ucco sattaratanamayo dibbuyyānavimānakapparukkhapaṭimaṇḍito bahū devo ākiṇṇadevā suvaṇṇamayā bhūmi
akkante pāde oṇamati uddhare pāde puna pureti pādavalañjitaṃ na dissati | kāraviko pana pabbato isindharamajjhe pamāṇo
ucco isindaramajjhe kuṭaṃ hoti sattaratanamayaṃ dibbuyyānavimānakapparukkhapaṭimaṇḍito bahū devā ākiṇṇadevā suvaṇṇamayā bhūmi
akkante pāde oṇamati uddhare pāde puna pureti pādavalañjitaṃ na dissati | sudassano nāma pabbato kāravikassa majjhe kuṭaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati sattaratanama

yaṃ dibbuyyānavimānakapparukkhapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ bahū devā ākiṇṇadevā | suvaṇṇamayā bhumi akkante pāde oṇamati uddhare pāde puna pureti pādavalañjitaṃ na dissa
ti | nemindharo nāma pabbato sudassanassa majjhe kuṭaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati sattaratanamayaṃ dibbuyyānavimānakapparukkhapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ bahū devā
ākiṇṇadevā | suvaṇṇamayā bhumi akkante pāde oṇamati uddhare pāde puna pureti pādavalañjitaṃ na dissati | vinattako nāma pabba
to nemindharassa majjhe kuṭaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati sattaratanamayaṃ dibbuyyānavimānakapparukkhapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ bahū devā ākiṇṇadevā | suvaṇṇa
mayā bhūmi akkante pāde oṇamati uddhare pāde puna pureti pādavalañjitaṃ na dissati | assakaṇṇo nāma pabbato sattaratanamayo imasmiṃ vinattake aḍhabhāge ku

no hoti | kati yugandharā atthi | cattāro yugandharā honti | puraṭṭhimayugandharo atthi dakkhiṇayugandharo atthi pacchimayugandharo atthi uttarayugandharo atthi |
puraṭṭhimayugandharo atthi dhataraṭṭho nāma dhataraṭṭhāya puri upari yojanasahassaṃ | dhataraṭṭhāya purimāya aḍhatayayojanasatāni | dhataraṭṭhā
ya dakkhiṇāya aḍhatayayojanasatāni | dhataraṭṭhāya pacchimāya aḍhatayayojanasatāni | dhataraṭṭhāya uttarāya aḍhatayayojanasatā
ni | dhataraṭṭhassa nivesanaṃ aḍhatayayojanasatāni | abhinivesanaṃ suvaṇṇapākārehi parikkhitaṃ ekayojaniko pākāro |
aḍhatayayojanasatikāni pākārapaṭimaṇḍitāni | evaṃ sabbaṃ natthi nicaṃ mahantañ ca natthi rukkhavanaṃ antarā nivesanānaṃ natthi bahiddhā rukkhavanaṃ aññe pi devaputtā anto dhu

vaṃ anurakkhaṃ antarā panaṃ nivesanāni cat(th)usālāni kūṭāgār(ā)ni pāsādahamiyāni balagga(t)opikāni yathānubhāvaṃ sā puri suvibhattā mahāpathā aṭṭhapadakajātā paññāsa ra
thikā dhvārena dhvāraṃ sandanti evaṃ sabbaṃ yathā- ○ nagaravaṇṇā uppannā honti dhataraṭṭhapuri rājadhāni aññe○hi devanagarehi devagāmehi devajja
padehi sampaṇṇā honti | tattha dhatara○ṭṭho mahārājā pativasati | tassa tatopādāya yāva ○ puraṭṭhimā cakkavāḷā āṇā ājānanti
gandhabbānaṃ so ādhipati | dakkhiṇayugandha○re virulhako nāma puri upari yojanasahassaṃ virulhakā○ya purimāya aḍhatayayojanasatāni | vi
r(a)lhakāya dakkhiṇāya aḍhatayayojanasatāni | vir(a)ḷhakāya pacchimāya aḍhatayayojana(ṃ)satāni | virulhakāya uttarāya aḍhatayayojanasatāni | virulhakassa

mahārājassa nivesanaṃ aḍhatayayojanasatāni | abhinivesanaṃ suvaṇṇapākārehi parikkhittaṃ ekayojaniko pākāro aḍhatayayojanāni pākārapaṭimaṇḍitāni |
evaṃ sabbaṃ natthi nicaṃ mahantañ ca natthi rukkhavana antarā ni○vesanāni natthi bahiddhā rukkhavanaṃ | aññe pi ○ devaputtā anto dhuvaṃ anurakkhaṃ antarāpanaṃ nivesa
nāni catusālāni kuṭāgārāni pā○sādahammiyāni balaggagopikāni yathānubhāvaṃ ○ sā puri suvibhattā mahāpathā aṭṭhapadaka
jātā paññāsa rathikā dhvārena dvāra sandanti | e○vaṃ sabbaṃ yathānagaravaṇṇā uppannā honti | virulhakapuri rā○ja⟪dhā⟫ni aññehi devanagarehi devagā
mehi devajanapadehi sampuṇṇā honti | tattha virulhako nāma mahārājā paṭivasati | tassa tatopādāya yāva dakkhiṇacakkavāḷā āṇā ājānanti |

kumbhaṇṭhānaṃ adhipati | pacchimayugandhare virupakkho nāma puri upariyojanasahassaṃ virupakkhāya purimāya aḍhatayayojanasatāni | virupakkhāya dakkhiṇā
ya aḍhatayayojanasatāni | vi○rupakkhāya pacchimāya aḍhatayayojanasatāni | vi○rupakkhāya uttarāya aḍhatayayojanasatāni |
virupakkhassa nāma mahārājassa nivesanaṃ a○ḍhatayayojanasatāni | abhinivesanaṃ suvaṇṇa○pākārehi parikkhitaṃ ekayojanāni
ko pākāro aḍhatayayojanasatikāni pā○kārapaṭimaṇḍitāni | evaṃ sabbaṃ natthi nicaṃ mahantañ ca na○tthi rukkhavanaṃ antarā nivesanāni natthi bahi
ddhā rukkhavanaṃ | aññe pi devaputtā anto dhuvaṃ anurakkhaṃ antarāpanaṃ nivesanāni catusālāni kuṭāgārāni pāsādahammiyāni balaggagopikāni yathānubhāvaṃ sā puri

suvibhattā mahāpathā aṭṭhapadakajātā paññāsa rathikā dvārena dvāraṃ sandanti | evaṃ sabbaṃ yathā nagaravaṇṇā uppannā honti | virupakkhapuri rājadhāni aññehi deva nagarehi de
vagāmehi devajanapadehi saṃpuṇṇā honti ○ | tattha virupakkho nāma mahārājā paṭivasati | ○ tassa tatopādāya yāva pacchimacakkavāḷā ā
ṇā ājānanti | nāgasupaṇṇānaṃ ○ so adhipati | uttarayugandhare vessavaṇṇo nāma pu○ri upari yojanasahassaṃ vessava
ṇṇāya purimāya aḍhatayayojanasatā○ni | vessavaṇṇāya dakkhiṇāya aḍhatayayojana○satāni | vessavaṇṇāya pacchimāya
aḍhatayayojanasatāni | vessavaṇṇāya uttarāya aḍhatayayojanasatāni | vessavaṇṇassa nāma mahārājassa nivesanaṃ aḍhatayayojanasatāni abhinivesanaṃ

suvaṇṇapākārehi parikkhittaṃ ekayojaniko pākāro aḍhatayayojanasatikāni pākārapaṭimaṇḍitāni | evaṃ sabbaṃ natthi nicaṃ mahantañ ca natthi rukkhavanaṃ antarā nivesa
nāni natthi bahiddhā rukkhavanaṃ aññe pi de○vaputtā anto dhuvaṃ anurakkhaṃ antarāpanaṃ nivesanāni catusā○lāni kuṭāgārāni pāsādahammiyāni ba
laggagopikāni yathānubhāvaṃ sā puri suvi○bhattā mahāpathā aṭṭhapadakajātā paññāsa rathikā dvārena dvā○raṃ sandhanti | evaṃ sabbaṃ yathā nagaravaṇṇā uppa
nnā honti vessavaṇṇapuri rāja(dh)āni aññe○hi devanagarehi devagāmehi devajanapadehi saṃpuṇṇā ○ honti | vessavaṇṇapurimhi alaṅkatamaṇḍā
kinī nāma pāsādo ahosi | tattha vessavaṇṇo nāma mahārājā pativasati | tassa tatopādāya yāva uttaracakkavāḷā āṇā ājānanti | yakkhānaṃ

so adhipati | evaṃ satta saṇṭhānāni jānitabbāni | catudi(pe) gāmanigamajanapadarājadhāni uppannā rājā ca devī ca bahu manussā ākiṇṇamanussā honti |
pubbavidehe manussānaṃ mukhā vaṭṭā | jambū○dipe manussānaṃ mukhā sakaṭayuttasaṇṭhānā | amarago○yāne manussānaṃ mukhā aḍhacandasaṇṭhānā
| uttarakurumhi manussānaṃ mukhā catu⟪ra⟫ssa○saṇṭhānā honti | catunnaṃ pana suvaṇṇadipānaṃ ○ simbalivanā jātā | garuddharājāno
tattha vasanti | heṭṭhā garuddhehi nāgahatthi○bhakkhā evaṃ parikkhito te pi paññāsa yojanāni udakāni ○ pakkhavāgehi onamitvā nāge uddharitvā pi bhuñjanti
| ten’upāyena tattha hatthikuṇapehi hatthi-aṭṭhikehi nāgakuṇapehi nāga-aṭṭhikehi dugandho ahosi | cakkavaḷapabbato dve asītiyojanasa

hassāni udakamajjhogaḷho tattakaṃ accuggato parikkhepena cha tiṃsayojanasatasahassāni dasa c’eva yojanasahassāni aḍhuḍhāni satāni |
tattha mahāsamuddo tiyojanasaha○ssāni tesaṭṭhiñca sahassāni tesaṭṭhiñca asitiñca ○ yojanasatāni | yattha sattā na pa
ññāyanti | tattha hoti mahāsamu○ddo tiyojanasahassāni vā tisaṭṭhiyojana○sahassāni te saṭṭhiñca yojanasatāni |
jambūdipabāhāya merussa aggāni paññā○sa yojanasatasahassāni tiṇi ca sahassāni aḍhapañcamā○ni ca yojanasatāni | merussa majjhaṃ bārasa
yojanasatasahassāni tīñi sahasahassāni paññāsa yojanasatāni evaṃ meruvajjaṃ ayaṃ amhākaṃ dipo dasasahassayojanappamāṇo |

catusahassayojanapamāṇo padeso udakena ajjhoṭṭhito jāto | tisahassayojanapamāṇe pa⟪de⟫se manussā vasanti | tisahassayojanapamā
ṇe padese himavā paṭiṭṭhito | hima○vā pabbato pana patiṭṭhitabhūto ubbedhena pañca yoja○nasatiko tisahassayojanavitthāra
to caturāsītisahassakuṭapaṭima○ṇḍito samantato sandamānāhi pañca mahanadī○hi vicitto himavantapadese | satta
mahā sarā honti ke nāma satta mahā○sarā anotattadaho kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho ratha○kāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāla
daho sippapātadaho maṇḍākinidaho ti tattha āyāmavitthārena gambhiratāya catupaññāsayojanāni diyaḍhayojanasatāni parimaṇḍalāni ime

satta mah(ā)sarā honti | tesu anotattadahaṃ dipeti | anotattadaho pana sudassanakuṭaṃ cittakuṭaṃ kāḷākuṭaṃ gandhamādanakuṭaṃ kelāsakūṭan ti imehi
pañcahi sabbatehi parikkhito | tattha su○dassanakuṭaṃ kanakamayaṃ dviyojanasatubbedhaṃ antovaṅkaṃ ○ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva saraṃ paṭicchā
detvā thitaṃ | cittakuṭam sattaratanama○yaṃ | kāḷakuṭaṃ añjanamayaṃ | gandhamādana○kuṭaṃ maṃsāragalamayaṃ abbhantaraṃ muggavaṇṇaṃ
| tattha mūlagandhaṃ phetugandhaṃ sāragandhaṃ pappati○kagandhaṃ tacagandhaṃ pattagandhaṃ rasagandhaṃ pupphagandhaṃ phalagandhaṃ gandha○gandhanti imehi dasahi gandhehi uppa
nnaṃ hoti | gandhehi modayati gandhamādano | kelāsakuṭaṃ rajaṭ(a)mayaṃ | sabbāni cetāni citrakuṭāni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhanāni |

tam eva saraṃ paṭ(ī)cchādetvā patiṭṭhitāni | sabbe devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena pavasanti | nadiyo ca tesu sandanti | taṃ pi sabbaṃ udakaṃ anottattam eva pavīsati |
candimasuriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā ○ pabbatantarena tattha obhāsaṃ karonti | ujuṃ gacchantā na karo○nti tena tassa ano(g)atto ti saṃkhā uda
pādi | tattha ratanamayamanuññasopā○ṇasilātalāni macchakacchapāni phalikasadisāni nimma○ludakāni na hānatiṭṭhāni sopāṇāni su
patiṭṭhitāni honti | ye ca buddhā pacceka○buddhā khīṇāsavā iddhimanto isayo na hāyanti | ○ devayakkhādayo āgantvā saresu kiḷanti |
tassa catusu passesu sihamukhaṃ hatthimukhaṃ assamukhaṃ usabhamukhanti cattāri mukhāni honti | catasso nadiyo sandanti | sihamukhato nikkhantanaditire si

hāni bahūtarāni honti | hatthimukhena nikkhantanaditire hatthi bahūtarā honti | assamukhena nikkhantanaditire assā bahūtarā honti | usabhamukhena nikkhantana
ditire usabhā bahūtarā honti | pu○raṭṭhimato nikkhantā nadi anotattaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā ti○sso nadiyo anuppagamma pācinahimmavanten’eva
amanussapathaṃ gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavi○santi | pacchimadisato ca uttaradisato ca nikkhanta○nadiyo tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimutta
rahimavantena amanussapathaṃ gantvā ma○hāsamuddaṃ pavīsanti | dakkhiṇato nikkhantanadi pana ano○tattaṃ (t)ikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ (k)atvā dakkhiṇena uju
kapāsāṇapiṭṭheneva saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā pabbata pariharitvā uṭṭhāya gacchati | parikkhepena gitāvutapamāṇā udakadhārā hutvā ākāsena saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā

tiyaṅgale nāma pāsāṇe patitā pāsāṇo udakadhārāvegena bhinno tattha paññāsayojanapamāṇe padese tiyaṅgalā nāma pokkharaṇī jātā | pokkhara
ṇī kulaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavīsitvā saṭṭhiyo○janakaṃ gantvā bahalagaṅgā ti vuccati | tattha gato gha○ṇapathavī udakadhārā bhinditvā umaṅgalena saṭṭhiyo
janakaṃ gantvā vijannāma tiracchānapabbataṃ pa○haritvā hatthatale pañcāṅgulisadisā pañca dhārā○ hutvā pavattanti | sā (t)ikkhattuṃ anotattaṃ pa
dakkhiṇaṃ katvā gatagataṭṭhāne āvaṭṭagaṅgā ti vucca○ti | ujukena pana pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva saṭṭhi yo○janāni gantvā gatagataṭṭhāne o(t)iṇṇagaṅgā
ti vuccati | pabbataṃ paharitvā uṭṭhāya parikkhepena (t)i(g)āvutappamāṇā udakadhārā hutvā ākāsena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā gatagataṭṭhāne ākāsagaṅgā ti

vuccati | tiyaṅgaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patiṭṭhito pāsāṇo udadhārāvegena bhinno paññāsayojanapamāṇe padese tiyaṅgaḷā nāma p(o)kkharaṇī ti vuccati | pokkha
raṇī kulaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ saṭṭhiyojanikaṃ ga○ntvā gatagataṭṭhāne pāsāṇagaṅgā ti vuccati | ta○ttha (g)ato ghanapatha(viṃ) bhinditvā umaṅgena saṭṭhiyojana
kaṃ gantvā gatagataṭṭhāne ummaṅgagaṅgā ○ ti vuccati | vijjhanāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā pa○ñcadhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne pana gaṅgā
yamunā aciravati sarabhū mahī ti imāni ○ pañca mahagaṅgāni (j)ātāni | tāsaṃ kira antare po○kkharaṇi paññāsayojanā nibbattati | pa
ññāsayojanamatte thāne sevālo vā paṇṇakaṃ vā kaddamaṃ vā natthi phalikavaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ hoti | tato paraṃ tattha kaṇṭhappamāṇe udake aḍhayojanavitthataṃ setaṃ

padumavanaṃ paññāsayojana mahāsaraṃ parikkhitvā thitaṃ | tadanantaraṃ aḍhayojanavitthataṃ gāvuttamatte thāne rattapadumavanaṃ | tadanantaraṃ rattakumudavana tadanantaraṃ niluppalavanaṃ tada
nantaraṃ rattuppalavanaṃ tadanantaraṃ sogandi○kavanaṃ tadanantaraṃ rattasālivanaṃ tadanantaraṃ elā○luvanaṃ tadanantaraṃ alābuvanaṃ | tadanantaraṃ
kumbhaṇḍāni tāni (m)adhu asāni valiphalāni || ○ tadanantaraṃ aḍhayojanavitthāraṃ ucchavanaṃ tattha kira pu(t)arakkha○ppamāṇaṃ ucchu ahosi | tadanantaraṃ ka
ddalivanaṃ tadanantaraṃ panasavanaṃ pātipa○māṇaṃ phalaṃ | tadanantaraṃ ambavanaṃ | tadanantaraṃ ka○piṭṭhavanaṃ | saṃkhepato himavantappade
se akhāditabbayuttakaṃ nāma phalaṃ natthi | evaṃ sabbā himavantapadese sabbakāmasamaṅgī honti | imasmiṃ ekacakkavāḷagabbhe catudipo honti | ekas⟪e⟫larā

jassa ime dve candimasuriyā anuparivattanti | sobhantī virocanti | cando anto maṇīvimāne vasati | taṃ vimānaṃ bahi rajaṭena parikkhitaṃ ubhayaṃ pi sita
lam eva hoti | suriyo anto kana○kavimāne vasati | taṃ bahi phalikehi parikkhitaṃ ○ ubhayaṃ pi uṇhameva hoti | pa
māṇato pana cando ujukaṃ ekūṇapaññā○sayojano parimaṇḍalato tīhi yojanehi o○ṇadiyaḍhasatayojano | suriyo uju
kaṃ paññāsayojano parimaṇḍalato ○ diyaḍhasatayojano | cando heṭṭhā thito suri○yo upari thito | candimasuriyānamanta
re ekayojanaṃ hoti | candassa heṭṭhimato suriyassa uparimato yojanasataṃ hoti | cando ujukaṃ gacchanto sanikaṃ gacchati | suriyo (g)iriyaṃ siṃghaṃ

gaccati | dvisu passesu nakkhattatārakagaṇā gacchanti | cando dhenu viya vacchakaṃ taṃ taṃ nakkhattaṃ upasaṅkamati | nakkhattāni pana attano gamanathānaṃ na (vi)jjahanti | suriyo uj(u)
kaṃ gacchanto (g)iriyaṃ gamanena gacchanto siṃghaṃ gaccha○ti | so kālapakkha-uposathadivasato pāṭipada○divase yojanasatasahassaṃ candamaṇḍa
laṃ ohāyā gacchati | atha cando lekhā vi○ya paññāyati | pakkhassa dutiye satasahassanti ○ evaṃ yāva puṇṇamīuposathadivasā satasaha
ssaṃ ohāya gacchati | atha cando anu○kkamena vaḍhitvā yāva uposathadivasā paripuṇṇo a○hosi | puna pāṭipadadivase
yojanasatasahassaṃ dhāvitvā suriyo candamaṇḍalaṃ gaṇhi | pakkhassa dutiya divase satasahassaṃ dhāvitvā suriyo candaṃ gaṇhāti | evaṃ yāva uposathadivasā satasaha

ssaṃ dhāvitvā suriyo candaṃ gaṇhāti | atha cando anukkamena hāyitvā kāḷapakkhe uposathadivase sabbaso na paññāyati | candaṃ heṭṭhā katvā suriyo upari ho
ti | mahatiyā pāṭiyā udakabhā○janaṃ viya candamaṇḍalaṃ piṭṭhiyati | majjhattike geha(n)ā○ya viya na candassa cchāyā paññāyati |
so cchāyāya apaññāyamānāya dure thitānaṃ ○ divā padipo viya na paññāyati | kati nesaṃ vithī○yo ti | ettha pana ajjavithi nāgavithi
govithi ti tisso vithiyo honti ○ | tattha ajjānaṃ udakaṃ paṭikulaṃ hoti | hatthinaṃ u○dakaṃ manāpaṃ hoti | usabhānaṃ samasi
tuṇhasamatāya (dh)āsukaṃ hoti | tasmā yaṃ kulaṃ candimasuriyā ajjavithiṃ āruyhanti | tadā devo ekabinduṃ pi na vassati | yadā nāgavithi āruyhanti | tadā

bhinnaṃ viya nabhaṃ paggharati | yadā govithiṃ āruyhanti | tadā utusamatā sampajjati | candimasuriyā cha māse sineruto bahi nikkhamanti | cha māse anto vicaranti |
te hi āsāḷhamāse sinerusamipe na vicara○nti | tato dve māse nikkhamitvā bahi sañcaranti | pathamakatikamase majjhena gacchanti | tato cakkavā
ḷābhimukkhā gantvā tayo māse cakkavāḷa○samipe caranti | puna nikkhamitvā citramāse majjhena ○ gantvā | tato pare dve māse sineru abhimukkhā
pakkhanditvā puna āsāḷamāse pi sinerusami○pena caranti | kittake thāne ālokaṃ karontī ti | ○ ekappahāren’eva tisu dipesu ālo
kaṃ karontī ti | kathaṃ | imasmiṃ dipe suriyuggamanakāle pubbavidehe majjhattiko hoti | uttarakurusu aṭṭhaṅgato amaragoyāne majjhimayāmo ho

ti | pubbavidehe uttamanakāle uttarakurusu majjhattiko | amaragoyāne aṭṭhaṅgato | idha jambudīpe majjhimayāmo hoti | uttarakurusu uggamanakāle a
maragoyāne majjhattiko | idha jambudi○pe aṭṭhaṅgato | pubbadehe majjhimayāmo | ○ amaragoyāne uggamanakāle idha majjittiko
| pubbavidehe aṭṭhaṅgato | uttara○kurusu majjhimayāmo : evaṃ iminā cakkavāḷapabbata○parikkhepena parikkhattatā divā caranti |
tato suriyaṭṭhaṅgamanato yāva aruṇu○ggamanato ratti suriyuggamanato yāva aṭṭhaṅgamana○to divā tato utusaṃvaccharanti | atha ma
ñcadasa rattiyo aḍhḍhamāso dve aḍhḍhamāsā ekamāso ti | cattāro māsā ekaṃ utu hoti | tayo utu ekaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ | evaṃ utusaṃvaccharā paññāyiṃsu | a

yaṃ ekā lokadhātu nāma | sinerupabbatarañño heṭṭhimatale caturāsīti yojanasahassāni majjhe cittapātalirukkhamūle cattāri silāpattāni | tisayojanapamā
ṇāni | tattha cattāro asurindo paṭivasanti | ○ yathā devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ upabhogā viya honti ta○thā asurānaṃ upabhogā | ayaṃ devamanussa
tiracchānānaṃ saṇṭhānam sambhavo hoti | ○ evam eva ekā lokadhātu gahītā | tādisaṃ sahassaṃ katvā ○ ayaṃ culanikā lokadhātu nāma | etta
ko sāvakānaṃ visayaparicchedo | dasa ○ sahassacakkavāḷā pana dvisahassalokadhātu majjhimakā nāma ○ | ayaṃ sāvakānaṃ avisayo | bu
ddhānaṃ ettake hi thāne tathāgatā andhakāraṃ vidhaṃsetvā sarīrobhāsaṃ dassetvā sarena viññāpetuṃ sakkonti | ettakena buddhānaṃ jātikhettaṃ nāma dasseti |
